channel.title: Tier IV on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Tier IV on Home

item.title: Tier IV Light Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.0 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Light Tanks by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Tier IV Light Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.1 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Light Tanks by Relative WR. item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier IV during update 6.0. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.0. On average, players played 17 battles.
